author: SupraDarky

text: Yup her name is Master Nekomata (猫叉Master). If you like this one you should listen to "Raindrops - Greening". All of her soundtrack are really worth listening.
author: DobieMeltfire

text: Ah shit I knew I recognized this from somewhere.
author: Bengon

text: modirufa6317 Nekomata (mostly under real name Naoyuki Sato) has done quite a bit for Konami outside of BEMANI; much more than other BEMANI composers. You can find his works in Coded Arms, Suikoden V, Jikkyou Powerful Pro, Otomedius, Quiz Magic Academy, etc... the list goes on.

text: It's been a while since my last Pop'n Music upload so I had to fix that. It seems like #18 had an overall Feudal Japan theme to it. As often the case with this series, a true head bopper!
